an7.26:4.1: “Mendicants, I will teach you seven principles that ensure you don’t decline.
an7.26:4.3: And what are the seven principles that ensure you don’t decline?
an7.26:4.4: As long as the mendicants develop the awakening-factors of mindfulness …
an7.26:5.7: they can expect growth, not decline.
an7.26:6.1: As long as these seven principles that ensure you don’t decline last among the mendicants, and as long as the mendicants are seen following them,
an7.26:6.2: they can expect growth, not decline.”
